entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 5.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Nanaimo Airport 10:00 AM PST Saturday 07 January 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: 5.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 32.2 km
Humidity: 96 %
Dewpoint: 5.0°C
Wind: WSW 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday: A few showers. High 7.
entry.summary: Showers. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 near the Strait of Georgia early this morning. Wind becoming light early this morning. High 7. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers this evening. Fog patches developing after midnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Showers. High 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Showers beginning in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 near the Strait of Georgia in the afternoon. High 6. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 07 January 2023
